title: Starving tot-boy eating cereal scraps of floor
itunes:title: Starving tot-boy eating cereal scraps of floor
description:
A stepfather accused of neglecting a disabled child told a judge the 5-year-old was not his responsibility. Suspicion about a stepmother grows in a missing child cold case. Why would a Georgia mom butcher her four kids and husband? Nancy Grace talks with Mark Klaas, Brian Claypool, Caryn Stark, Joseph Scott Morgan and Alan Duke about these stories in this episode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
